
```{r}
##### PREPARE VARIABLES FOR LINEAR REGRESSION

# SET CATEGORICAL VARIABLES AS FACTORS
PFAS_A$race <- as.factor(PFAS_A$race)
PFAS_A$income <- as.factor(PFAS_A$income)
PFAS_A$parity <- as.factor(PFAS_A$parity)
PFAS_A$smoke <- as.factor(PFAS_A$smoke)
PFAS_A$married <- as.factor(PFAS_A$married)
PFAS_A$edu <- as.factor(PFAS_A$edu)

PFAS_D$race <- as.factor(PFAS_D$race)
PFAS_D$income <- as.factor(PFAS_D$income)
PFAS_D$parity <- as.factor(PFAS_D$parity)
PFAS_D$smoke <- as.factor(PFAS_D$smoke)
PFAS_D$married <- as.factor(PFAS_D$married)
PFAS_D$edu <- as.factor(PFAS_D$edu)

```

```{r}
##### EMPLOY FDR CORRECTION
# GET EXACT P-VALUES FOR ASSOCIATIONS WITH P < 0.001
BMI_PFOS <- glm(LNBMI ~ L2PFOS + age_enroll + race + income + menar + smoke +  
                 parity + married, family = gaussian, data = PFAS_A)
summary(BMI_PFOS)$coefficients[2,4]  

BMI_EtF <- glm(LNBMI ~ L2EtFOSAA + age_enroll + race + income + menar + smoke +  
                 parity + married, family = gaussian, data = PFAS_A)
summary(BMI_EtF)$coefficients[2,4]  

# CREATE NUMERIC VECTOR OF P-VALUES
pval_a <- c( 0.0007957443, 0.006, 0.550, 0.930, 0.415, 0.0009692368,
             0.034, 0.022, 0.049, 0.481, 0.824, 0.004,
             0.7, 0.07, 0.028, 0.72, 0.87, 0.10,
             0.005, 0.011, 0.331, 0.475, 0.264, 0.001)

# ADJUST P-VALUES WITH VARIOUS METHODS
BH_a <- p.adjust(pval_a, method = "BH")
BY_a <- p.adjust(pval_a, method = "BY")
FDR_a <- p.adjust(pval_a, method = "fdr")

# CREATE A DATASET OF RAW AND ADJUSTED P-VALUES
ADJUSTED_a <- as.data.frame(cbind(pval_a, BH_a, BY_a, FDR_a))

```

```{r}
##### EMPLOY FDR CORRECTION
# CREATE NUMERIC VECTOR OF P-VALUES
pval_d <- c( 0.024, 0.055, 0.354, 0.281, 1.00, 0.011,
             0.01, 0.06, 0.277, 0.32, 0.75, 0.011,
             0.014, 0.045, 0.550, 0.135, 0.587, 0.039)

# ADJUST P-VALUES WITH VARIOUS METHODS
BH_d <- p.adjust(pval_d, method = "BH")
BY_d <- p.adjust(pval_d, method = "BY")
FDR_d <- p.adjust(pval_d, method = "fdr")

# CREATE A DATASET OF RAW AND ADJUSTED P-VALUES
ADJUSTED_d <- as.data.frame(cbind(pval_d, BH_d, BY_d, FDR_d))
```

```{r}
##### EMPLOY FDR CORRECTION
# BMI
pval_BMI <- NULL
for (i in 42:47){
m_BMI <- glm(PFAS_A$LNBMI ~ PFAS_A[[i]] + PFAS_A$age_enroll + PFAS_A$race + 
                PFAS_A$income + PFAS_A$menar + PFAS_A$smoke +  PFAS_A$parity + 
                PFAS_A$married, family = gaussian)
p_BMI <- summary(m_BMI)$coefficients[2,]
pval_BMI <- rbind(pval_BMI, p_BMI)
rownames(pval_BMI)[i-41] <- paste("X", i-41, sep="")
}

pval_BMI_set <- pval_BMI[,4]

FDR_BMI <- p.adjust(pval_BMI_set, method="fdr")

FWER_BMI
```
